titleStmt.title: To THE REV. W.H. BROOKFIELD,The Rev. William Henry Brookfield (1809-74; Dictionary of National Biography). At Trinity College, Cambridge, 1829-33, with Tennyson, Arthur Hallam and Thackeray; BA 1833; ordained curate 1834. Married Jane Olivia Elton 1841. Inspector of Schools 1848-61; Hon. Chaplain to the Queen 1860. Well-known preacher, public reader and witty conversationalist. 13 APRIL 1861
